"Teeheehee, I'm a Predacon!" Pumpskin giggles as he lifts the 
entangled Maximal easily into the air.  (This guy's extremely strong, 
BTW.  He could lift a dumpster off the ground with those things, and 
dump it out.)  "What more needs to be said?"

His other two tentacles retreat from attacking Katya and join
their siblings in applying crushing pressure on Blackfang.  He fires 
his eye lasers at Katya to keep her busy.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Katya being cold-headed most of the time had kept her weapons up 
just 
> in case. It paid off, as she shot the incoming tendrils as soon as 
she 
> saw them.
> 
> Blackfang, on the other hand, had not been so pessimist and was 
soon 
> entangled in a mass of vines. He tried to look for a way out and 
> thought he had found one...
> 
> Blackfang: What are you doing, fool? Why are you attacking us?
> 
> Katya: Stravag freebirth traitor! You do not even deserve a 
warrior's 
> death!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > OOC: Blackfang and Katya.  He IS psychotic, after all.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Is Pumpskin attacking Fury and Riekan or Blackfang and 
Katya?
> > > 
> > > Ragnar's situation was deteriorating. Another poisoned blast 
hit 
> > him 
> > > and an explosion twisted his fright foot backward. But he was 
too 
> > > groggy to feel it.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: They're firing the same weapons as always - explosive 
> > harpoons 
> > > > and cybervenom blasts.
> > > > 
> > > > The surprised Rogues take to the air to avoid the sudden 
barrage 
> > of 
> > > > counterfire.  Riekan's harpoon gun and Fury's cybervenom dart-
> > > > launcher speak in reply.  Looking at Pumpskin, Fury shakes 
his 
> > > > head.  "I thought that joker was on our side!"
> > > > 
> > > > Answering the charge, Pumpskin suddenly strikes out at his 
> > > > two "allies", seeking once again to ensnare them with his 
> > tentacles 
> > > > (two tendrils each), this time with the appendages seeping 
> > caustic 
> > > > fluids.  "He is!" the crazed warrior chortles.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Windlord:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "Ok"replied the male "I'll cover you.."
> > > > > 
> > > > > He fired against the enemie
> > > > >

> > > > > >
